channel.title: Make server public?
channel.description: Right now i can only start my server on 0.0.0.0 for an ip address... how can i make it public... and my own ip address?

item.title: Make server public?
item.dc:creator: @zraffz zraffz
item.description:
@zraffz wrote:

You might need to forward your ports as well. To get your IP go to www.whatismyip.com

Read full topic

item.title: Make server public?
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Then set up a no-ip and click “run server” in your server source.
Then using your no-ip ip you can logg into your server, aswell as other people[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2008, 01:58:51 PM[/size][hr]Im not sure i suggest making another post called
“Making a server with no-ip”

I use dyndns so im not sure what to do for no-ip users

Read full topic

item.title: Make server public?
item.dc:creator: @cj_macky cj_macky
item.description:
@cj_macky wrote:

i have no-ip… and how do you creat an ip address for it?

Read full topic

item.title: Make server public?
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0 is a local host if you have made your server and created a ip address once you click run server you will get this
"server started at 0.0.0.0: 43594 < that may change depending on the port.

That meens our server is set online, people can still access using your created ip address

To make an ip depending on your comp you can make a hamachi
by downloading hamachi
running it
creating a network on hamachi
and then run your server from your source file.
People must join your network to play.

This way is complicated.

You can use www.dyndns.org
or www.no-ip.com

Read full topic
